message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $120. I think you'll find it's a great value at this price.
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $85 right now. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $85 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm happy to split the difference and offer $95.  Let me know what you think.
